DB Editor and New Features in 7.2

DB Editor allows you to implement new features in CareSuite 7.2:

l If you have installed Anesthesia Manager and OR Manager, you can configure these applications to work together.

Configure the system for perioperative integration

l If you are configuring a multibed unit, you can create patient locations (beds).

Create a patient location for a multibed unit

l Set parameters related to audit trails.

Configure the type of audit trail

Configure the audit trail warning for users

l Set properties of real-time variables in the database, including formulas for derived variables.

Set the properties of real-time variables

If CareSuite is not configured for perioperative integration with OR Manager, use Picis Security Manager, you can also use DB Editor to do the following:

l Assign new system rights to user groups to control access to the following actions: editing events, editing real-time data, moving and resizing application windows and making printouts.

Modify a user group

l Configure access rights for documenting specific medications, fluids, scores, assessments and other treatments. (Previously you could only configure the rights for ordering these items.)

Treatments

l Set password expiration parameters.

Set the password expiration period

Set the advance notice for password expiration
